document.full_text: new york police arrested two north african-born men in a sting operation after they bought a hand grenade and guns wanting to attack synagogues, kill jews and blow up the empire state building, authorities said on thursday.
document.title: two arrested in new york synagogue attack plot
lines_and_colors: new york police arrested two north african-born men in a sting operation after they bought a hand grenade and guns wanting to attack synagogues, kill jews and blow up the empire state building, authorities said on thursday.
